sourcesContent:
<template>
    <input class=" input__checkbox--icon" type="checkbox" v-model="listCheckboxSellected" :value="this.checkboxValueInput">
</template>
<script>
export default {
    props: {
        checkboxValue: null

        ,
        listChecked:[]
    },
    created() {
        this.checkboxValueInput = this.checkboxValue;
    },
    watch: {
        listCheckboxSellected: function (newValue) {
            this.$emit("update:listChecked", newValue);
        }
    },
    data() {
        return {
            listCheckboxSellected: [],
            checkboxValueInput: null
        }
    },
}
</script>
<style scoped></style>
